name: Cappuccino
description: A rich, bold espresso combined with velvety steamed milk and topped with a thick layer of creamy foam. Cappuccino offers a perfect balance of flavors and textures in every sip, making it a favorite choice for coffee enthusiasts.

name: Mocha
description: A delightful blend of rich espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate syrup, topped with whipped cream. Mocha offers a decadent flavor experience with a perfect balance of sweetness and bitterness, indulging your senses with every sip.

name: Macchiato
description: A classic espresso-based drink with a dash of steamed milk and foam. Macchiato offers a bold coffee flavor with a hint of creaminess, perfect for those who prefer a strong coffee taste and appreciate a touch of sweetness.

name: Americano
description: A simple yet satisfying coffee made by diluting a shot of espresso with hot water. Americano offers a smooth and robust flavor profile, ideal for those who enjoy a milder coffee taste and appreciate the pure essence of coffee.

name: Flat White
description: A velvety-smooth coffee made with a double shot of espresso and creamy steamed milk. Flat White offers a balanced flavor with a subtle sweetness and a silky texture, perfect for coffee lovers seeking a luxurious and indulgent experience.

name: Affogato
description: An indulgent dessert made with a scoop of vanilla ice cream drowned in a shot of hot espresso. Affogato offers a delightful combination of hot and cold, bitter and sweet flavors, creating a heavenly treat for your taste buds.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: A traditional coffee brewing method that involves simmering finely-ground coffee beans with water and sugar in a special pot called a cezve. Turkish Coffee offers a rich and aromatic flavor experience with a thick texture, capturing the essence of centuries-old coffee culture.

name: Espresso
description: A strong and concentrated coffee made by forcing hot water through finely-ground coffee beans. Espresso delivers a bold and intense flavor experience with a rich crema on top, providing an invigorating boost to kickstart your day.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee drink made with a shot of espresso and steamed milk. Latte offers a mild flavor profile with a hint of sweetness, perfect for coffee enthusiasts seeking a comforting and satisfying beverage.
